channel.title: Need serious help
channel.description: i try to run my server every time i try to run it it says running scape 0.0.0.0:5555 also how do i register my server on moparscape because every time it says u cant use periods

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

I know but it is better to have one if no-ip is down they can log in using that, but your right you dont need to but its only so if its down u can type that in lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @KrisGreen KrisGreen
item.description:
@KrisGreen wrote:

you dont need your default gateway in your server lol you need a static IP adress

Read full topic

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

KrisGres exactly right !

You need to go into YOUR server and right click to eddit client in the folder.

in there search for 0.0.0.0 and changen that to you current ip address, it can be found by getting cmd and typing ipconfig or somthing, and look for default gateway but it will tell you on moparscape if you look were you have posted near the the bottom were it would say somthing like e.g 234.34.23.55 thats only an examle btw

and do that in your client and server in you server and client folders.

the same with your ip but search for 5555 and replace with 43594 in every folder witch will have it in, if you need more help just email me or search it up in google,

Read full topic

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @KrisGreen KrisGreen
item.description:
@KrisGreen wrote:

moparscape is weird i tryed registering my server to it like 20 times it never works, so idk about that but . 0.0.0.0 is your default ip which allows you to log in and 5555 is the port its using, if you wish to host it you need to change the 0.0.0.0 to your IP and change the 5555 to 43594

Read full topic
